Pre-Game Insights: The Reds are calling up Rhett Lowder to pitch against the Milwaukee Brewers on August 30th.
Lowder was the Reds' 1st round and 7th overall draft pick in 2023.
It hasn't been announced if he will start the game at 12:40pm or the game at 6:40pm.
Others: Lowder began the year in High-A Dayton and moved up to Double-A Chattanooga in early May.
He had a 2.49 ERA in five starts in High-A Dayton and a 5.06 ERA in seven starts in Double-A Chattanooga.
In his last six starts, Lowder gave up four entire runs over 34.0 innings and allowed just 20 hits.
He made his debut for Louisville last week and threw six shutout innings and allowed just three hits, walked no one, and had seven strikeouts.
